name: Jigsaw Art Puzzle Mania
description:
Welcome to the jigsaw hub!
Enjoy the most amazing collection of puzzles and play FREE jigsaw puzzles every day!

Wide choice of different categories of puzzles makes the Jigsaw Art Puzzle Mania a real puzzledom, suitable for both adults and children. The function of a puzzle maker - you can make jigsaw puzzles of your own photos. This premium quality of Jigsaw Art Puzzle Mania is the perfect choice for lovers of jigsaw puzzles. Relax, enjoy and train your brain with Jigsaw Art Puzzle Mania, a brand new jigsaw puzzle game with tons of HD quality pictures. Every piece of our jigsaw puzzle is unique and is individually crafted and designed to ensure an authentic and pleasant experience for all those who love playing classic jigsaw puzzles.

We're constantly creating new puzzles that we know you will love!

Jigsaw Art Puzzle Mania is great for puzzlers of all ages and experience levels. Just pick your number of puzzle pieces and go, it's that simple! Download and join Jigsaw Art Puzzle Mania photo puzzle game NOW!

FEATURES
- Free daily updated jigsaw puzzle gallery.
- Tons beautiful, HD puzzles combined into a huge variety of jigsaw collections!
- Choose difficulty levels with up to 1024 pieces: start as a beginner, train hard and become a game master!
- Create a photo puzzle with your own picture and share with friends or with the Jigsaw Art Puzzle Mania community!
- Earn rewards by completing puzzles!
- Play large puzzles!
- Relax music soundtracks
- Work on more than one puzzle at a time

Happy playing jigsaw puzzles with Jigsaw Art Puzzle Mania
We would love to hear your feedback!

PLEASE NOTE! Jigsaw Art Puzzle Mania is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money.

Support
Questions? Contact our tech support at jigsawpuzzle@playcus.com
